page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: MOST PEOPLE IN THE{BRUNTON}AREA ARE EMPLOYED.ONLY{THREE EIGHTHS}ARE {UNEMPLOYED}WHICH IN MOST CASES IS BECAUSE THEY ARE{RETIRED.}THE PEOPLE WORK IN THE FOLLOWING PLACES:{THREE {EIGHTHS}OF THE{WORKING}POPULATION WORK IN THE{BRUNTON}AREA,AND THE REMAINING FIVE{EIGHTS}WORK AT{CUPAR,ST ANDREWS, {LUTHRIE}AND{METHIL HILL.}THE JOBS PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED AT ARE AS FOLLOWS: {ONE EIGHTH}OF THE POPULATION WORK ON {FARMS,}ARE{GARDENERS,}ARE{HOME HELPS, DO{HOUSE WORK,}ARE{FAMILY WORKERS}OR ARE{POLICE MEN.}THERE ARE NOT AS MANY PEOPLE EMPLOYED ON FARMS NOW BECAUSE OF{FARM MECHANISATION.
